docs.snippet: Revaluation rumors dotted the trading in the foreign exchange market last week to result in wide price swings in the currencies under gossip (Australia, Canada and Switzerland). Wide price swings were registered in all three, the first two moving...
docs.lead_paragraph: Revaluation rumors dotted the trading in the foreign exchange market last week to result in wide price swings in the currencies under gossip (Australia, Canada and Switzerland). Wide price swings were registered in all three, the first two moving higher on probable upward revaluation, while the Swiss unit dipped sharply on devaluation. However, in no instance was there official confirmation of the rumors.

docs.snippet: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, June 6 --The Soviet Union's challenge to continental unity in the Western Hemisphere through its so-called people's national liberation front policy, which has won a foothold in Guatemala, is being pressed today in at least four...
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica, June 6 --The Soviet Union's challenge to continental unity in the Western Hemisphere through its so-called people's national liberation front policy, which has won a foothold in Guatemala, is being pressed today in at least four other LatinAmerican republics. In others the groundwork for the policy is being laid.
